claude.title: Claude AI API
claude.description: To use AI features like wine enrichment and food pairing recommendations, you can provide your own Claude API key.
claude.fallbackInfo: If you don't provide a key, the application will attempt to use the server-wide default key if configured.
claude.label: Claude API Key
claude.getApiKey: Get an API key from Anthropic

about.title: About Celly
about.description: Celly is your personal wine cellar assistant. Manage your collection, get AI-powered insights, and find the perfect food pairings.
